SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_ISTITLEACADEMIC_DOCTORAL
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Is the title academic doctoral level?
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_ISTITLEACADEMIC_DOCTORAL(@TITLEGUID uniqueidentifier) returns bit with execute as caller as begin DECLARE @RESULT bit = 0
SELECT @RESULT = case COUNT(tp.ID) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM dbo.USR_TITLEPROPERTIES tp WHERE tp.TITLECODEID = @TITLEGUID AND tp.ISSPECIALTITLE = 1
IF @RESULT IS NULL SET @RESULT = 0
return @RESULT end
